thread.title: Leslie DuVal Okonsky
thread.title_full: EnjoyCPR reviewed by Leslie DuVal Okonsky

author: Leslie DuVal Okonsky
title: Leslie DuVal Okonsky
text: Instructor was great. Generally speaking, CPR certification/recertification is not one's first choice on how to spend a Saturday morning. The instructor presented very well and kept the class engaged. We took turns on individual, 2-person team then multiple-person team scenarios. I feel confident in both my knowledge and skill.
